story: BEEP, by Climate Smart Businesses Inc, is a carbon mapping tool that helps cities work with local businesses to reduce greenhouse gas emissions.
Bleu.eco designs ecological mattresses and beds using natural materials at reasonable prices. 3 trees are planted for each mattress sold.
GRÃœNBAG makes high-quality bags that last, using only durable materials to reduce future waste.
Leap is a design studio that believes in designing with purpose and creating work that matters. As a BCorp, they create responsible solutions that exceed triple bottom line standards.
Preserve, a certified B Corporation, makes stylish, eco-friendly products for the home including reusable tableware, food storage, and personal care products, using 100% recycled plastic.
Meridian Institute established the Supply Chain Sustainability Research Fund to increase understanding of sustainability in agriculture, seafood, and forest supply chains.
